modName: Zack - Final Fantasy 7 Clothes and Hairstyle
summary: This mod adds Zack\'s Clothes and Hairstyle from Final Fantasy 7.
descriptionHtml:
ZackFF7Clothes&Hair
by hardarg
v1.0

================================
[color=orange][b]D E S C R I P T I O N[/b][/color]
================================
[i]\"My honor.. My dreams.. They\'re yours now. You\'ll be.. My living legacy.\"[/i] -[b]Zack[/b]

This mod adds Zack\'s outfit and hairstyle from Final Fantasy 7.

It available in the forge as heavy armor, as well as being temperable.

Use help soldier 4 for easier access to items.
Use showracemenu to change hairstyle.


================================
[color=orange][b]C H A N G E L O G[/b][/color]
================================
v1.0	(03/10/2013)
  Outfit and Hairstyle released


================================
[color=orange][b]I N S T A L L A T I O N[/b][/color]
================================
NMM
1.) Download with Manager
2.) Activate Cloud - FinalFantasy7CC Clothes and Hairstyle, under Armor Calegory.
3.) Play and Enjoy.

Manual Installation
1.) Extract data folder in this archive to a temporary folder, preferably on the Desktop for easier access.
2.) Copy the extracted data folder to your Skyrim directory.
3.) Launch Skyrim, enable hardargZack.esp in your data files.
4.) Play and Enjoy.


================================
[color=orange][b]U N I N S T A L L A T I O N[/b][/color]
================================
If you have NMM, simply deactivate the mod.

If not, delete the folders named hardarg, in your meshes and textures folder. Delete hardargZack.esp as well.

If you have other mods made by me installed, then only delete Zack subfolders from hardarg folder.


================================
[color=orange][b]K N O W N  B U G S  /  I N C O M P A T I B I L I T I E S[/b][/color]
================================
Please report, if found any.


================================
[color=orange][b]F . A . Q[/b][/color]
================================
Q: Why make Zack?
A: Originally meantly to be released only as a hairstyle, but then I felt it was incomplete without an outfit compared to my other mods, so I made my version. :D

Q: Will you make Zack\'s clothing from xxxxxx?
A: No plans so far, I\'m afraid.

Q: Is this wearable for Beast races?
A: No.


================================
[color=orange][b]C O N T A C T[/b][/color]
================================
I am reachable via PM,

================================

================================
